snippet: Moody’s gave Chicago a negative outlook, indicating another downgrade could occur if there is no pension fix.
abstract: Moody’s Investors Service downgrades Chicago’s credit rating to Baa1 from A3, putting it three notches above junk status; cites city’s unfunded pension liabilities.
lead_paragraph: Moody’s gave Chicago a negative outlook, indicating another downgrade could occur if there is no pension fix.

headline.main: Chicago’s Credit Rating Downgraded by Moody’s
headline.print_headline: Chicago’s Credit Rating Downgraded by Moody’s

keywords.value: Credit Ratings and Credit Rating Agencies
keywords.name: subject
